pages.text: $(7)We have made an incredible discovery, but... it isn't right. What we had to do to get here, following the footsteps of the insane, it's just wrong... In any case, by sprinkling salis mundus on a ritual stone of dawn, we have managed to create a... device? We are baffled as to how it works, but it seems to take in light and store the energy within itself. It also seems to have a space to put in items...

$(7)We experimented with all sorts of objects, but the device only seems to accept fuel items. When provided with a fuel item, it seems to infuse it with energy, transforming it into a stronger fuel item. It seems stronger fuel items take longer to 'upgrade'.$(#b57794) We are going to put some glowstone in and let it run overnight, perhaps something will happen?
